text: == Events == === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * July 4 - Saint Ulrich of Augsburg is canonized. == Births == * Samuel ibn Naghrela, assistant to the Berber king in Granada == Deaths == * King Conrad of Burgundy == In fiction == * The fantasy role-playing game Dragon Warriors is set in a fantasy world called "Legend" modeled on medieval Europe in an era near this year. * In the Harry Potter series, Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is built and founded sometime around this year. == References ==
